name: Space Yard Dodge
description:
Space Yard Dodge is a high paced action arcade endless runner where you can pick up power-ups to destroy ships and rocks that are hurdling towards you at rapid speed.
Your main goal is to shot as many things as possible so you can get the most amount of points and be the ultimate spaceman.

Download & install instructions
  • Download .zip file
  • Place in a folder on your desktop
  • Right-click > Extract Here
  • Double click on Space Yard Dodge
  • Double click on Space Yard Dodge.exe
  •  Enjoy
